resources.string: Change the naming preferences you set when creating your account, such as first name, last name or academic title.
Change the email connected to you account. You will need to verify the new email address as a security measure.
Change or reset your password in case you have forgotten it. You will need to verify your current email address as a security measure.
Log this device out of your account. Other devices will stil be logged in.
Log out all devices connected to this account. You will have to re-login on every device.
Delete this account. This action is irreversible and will delete any data stored on this account.
Are you sure that you want to delete you account? This action is permanent and cannot be undone. To confirm, please type the email address that your account is connected to.
